Marble Package

Color: White
Apartment Type/Number of Items: 1 Bedroom/15 Items

Confirm your order with your private customer service manager today. You can also mix and match items as needed.

Free supervision & shipping included in package price

The Marble White Package adds effortless elegance and timeless charm to your home, creating a serene and stylish ambiance. This set includes living room, dining room, and bedroom items, offering a cohesive design that brings modern sophistication to every space for a sophisticated touch.

The living room pieces offer a minimalist design with neutral tones and elegant finishes, providing a calm space for relaxation and entertainment.

The dining room furniture blends simplicity with luxury, featuring marble elements and clean lines that elevate any meal.

The bedroom set is a peaceful retreat, where soft tones create a restful, elegant environment for sleep and relaxation.

Perfect for those seeking modern sophistication and serene beauty, with a design that's both contemporary and timeless.

Free Product Specialist Visit

Our design specialists will visit your space to ensure perfect fit and styling. This complimentary service includes measurement, design consultation, and space planning.

Delivery & Assembly

Professional delivery and assembly service included. Our team will deliver, assemble, and position all items in your space. Delivery typically takes 4-6 days from order confirmation.

Returns & Refunds

30-day return policy on all items. If you're not completely satisfied, we'll arrange pickup and provide a full refund. Custom items may have different return conditions.
